This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS No movement 
PASS Small positive X movement 
PASS Large positive X movement 
PASS Small negative X movement 
PASS Large negative X movement 
PASS Small positive Y movement 
PASS Large positive Y movement 
PASS Small negative Y movement 
PASS Large negative Y movement 
PASS Small positive X + positive Y movement 
PASS Small negative X + positive Y movement 
PASS Small positive X + negative Y movement 
PASS Small negative X + negative Y movement 
PASS Link, small positive X movement 
PASS Link, large positive X movement 
PASS Link, small negative X movement 
PASS Link, large negative X movement 
PASS Link, small positive Y movement 
PASS Link, large positive Y movement 
PASS Link, small negative Y movement 
PASS Link, large negative Y movement 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
